info.name: KeyTour RBAC System V2
info.description:
Comprehensive test collection for KeyTour RBAC System V2

This collection includes:
- Authentication flow with JWT tokens
- Staff management operations
- Role and permission management
- Permission testing scenarios
- Token management
- Error handling tests

Environment Variables Required:
- baseUrl: http://localhost:3000
- accessToken: (auto-set by login)
- refreshToken: (auto-set by login)
- userId: (auto-set by login)
- staffId: (auto-set by staff creation)
- roleId: (auto-set by role creation)
- permissionId: (auto-set by permission creation)
